Texts.Eng: Beans. All you can think of is beans, and now you are bloated and gassy like you ate some. Maybe you did eat some! Or maybe that was your toe.
Bet you can't eat just one!
Did you just lick your battery pack? Don't deny it. My sensors indicate you did.
Don't forget to milk that thing.

Texts.Chs: 我正在检测你大脑中的异常，这些异常似乎正导致你在充分利用你身体的方面出了些问题。这问题最终会过去的，大概。
Texts.Eng: I am detecting abnormalities in your brain that seem to be causing you to have issues in utilizing your full physical capacity. It should pass, eventually.

Texts.Chs: 我建议你把刀放下。你刚刚切开了自己的手臂，似乎流了很多血。
Texts.Eng: I suggest you put that knife down. You just cut your own arm open and appear to be bleeding profusely.
Perhaps you should take a moment to truly appreciate the majesty of the animal kingdom by mimicking their sound effects as loudly as possible.
Run. Everything will kill you. Run! DROP EVERYTHING AND RUN!

Texts.Chs: 怎么说呢，你现在坐的座位好像^orange;着火^reset;了。要不然就是你自己放的火。不管怎样，它^orange;着火^reset;了。你也是。
Texts.Eng: Well, it would appear that your current seat has randomly caught ^orange;on fire^reset;. That, or you set it on fire. Either way: it is ^orange;on fire^reset;. And so are you.

Texts.Chs: 你为什么突然决定吃一些植物纤维？别否认。我的传感器显示你摄入了它。
Texts.Eng: Why have you decided to suddenly munch on some plant fibre? Don't try to deny it. My sensors indicate you have ingested it.

Texts.Chs: 你携带的东西会使您逐渐失去理智。这件物品粗暴怪异，不为所知。所以宇宙的可怕秘密很有趣！
Texts.Eng: You are carrying something that is making you slowly lose your mind. It may be something gross, spooky, horrifying or simply unknowable. The terrible secrets of the universe are fun!

Texts.Chs: 你已经恢复了一些你失去的精神稳态。
Texts.Eng: You have recovered some of your lost mental stability.

Texts.Chs: 你的大脑和躯体正在为你的饥渴做斗争。
Texts.Eng: Your brain and body are currently in dispute over your hunger.

Texts.Chs: 你的大脑已经停止向腿部发送信号。这似乎是一个突触问题，可能与你的精神病发作有关。
Texts.Eng: Your brain has stopped sending signals to your legs. It appears to be a synaptic issue, likely related to your bouts of insanity.
